979680.name: In your Shadow
979680.description: "In your Shadow" is a Visual Novel point-and-click game that tells the story of three people: Lilly Emmett, Skyler Hasgrove, and Zachary Sorio. One night all three of their lives change in a second: Skyler is poisoned, Lilly is catfished and met with her sister's death again, and Zachary gets a fateful phone call. After teaming up to find who did these things to them, they find themselves in a life or death situation, and the player is lead through a comedic yet dramatic story with multiple endings.
979680.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
